name: VRE-A1-004 “Club Nikita” by On-Chain Interactive
description:
"Back in the block, whether you were looking for black-market mRNA shots, military-grade optics, or just some good old-fashioned virtual fun, Nikita was the place to go.

Besides the fact of it being a comforting hook-up spot for the broader network, the legendary VR Club was a sanctuary where we could connect directly to web3 and roam into pure information like you’d be diving in a pool.

I remember the tiny moments we used to steal, pretending we’re smoking outside before we naturally dive in."

~
credits:

*part of the 
VRE-A1 | On-Chain Interactive - Gasless Love

*about
Virtual Reality Environments

...is a series of audiovisual specimens published on the public Tezos blockchain via the HEN platform. Media include collaborative efforts between Jock Sungus and Ross Peili. As the title suggests, a Virtual Reality Environment is better served in the metaverse, analogizing it is meant to simulate geometrical, physical, and spatial aspects not often found in 2D media.

visual environment: @jocksungus
audible environment: @rosspeili
